mil7.6.8:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘jalukaya ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.6.8:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, jaluka yattha alliyati, tattheva dalham alliyitva ruhiram pivati;
mil7.6.8:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena yasmim arammane cittam alliyati, tam arammanam vannato ca santhanato ca disato ca okasato ca paricchedato ca lingato ca nimittato ca dalham patitthapetva tenevarammanena vimuttirasamasecanakam patabbam.
mil7.6.8:1.4: Idam, maharaja, jalukaya ekam angam gahetabbam.
